basics.description: **Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution: • Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Solutions/Veritas%20NetBackup/ReleaseNotes.md) • There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing. The [Veritas](https://www.veritas.com/) solution for Microsoft Sentinel allows you to analyze NetBackup audit events. The solution uses analytics rules to automatically generate incidents when an abnormal user activity is detected in NetBackup. **Analytic Rules:** 2 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This solution installs the following analytic rule templates. After installing the solution, create and enable analytic rules in Manage solution view.

elements.name: analytic1
elements.label: Alarming number of anomalies generated in NetBackup

options.text: This rule generates an incident when an alarming number of anomalies are generated in the last 15 minutes.

elements.name: analytic2
elements.label: Multiple failed attempts of NetBackup login

options.text: This rule generates an incident when there are more than 5 failed login attemts for a given host in the last 15 minutes.
